contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''Garnisonen i Porsanger''', based at [[Porsangmoen]] in [[Porsanger]], is the world's northernmost military garrison at 70 degrees northern [[latitude]], located in the Norwegian county of [[Finnmark]]. It trains and houses the [[Jegerkompaniet|jegerkompani]] / [[ISTAR]], formerly a part of the [[Finnmark regiment]], together with [[Garnisonen i SÃ¸r-Varanger]] and [[Alta Battalion]]. Jegerkompaniet, as well as a petty officer's training centre for the [[Norwegian Home Guard|Home Guard]]. The garrison is located immediately adjacent to Halkavarre, the largest military training area in Norway. {{DEFAULTSORT:Garnisonen I Porsanger}} [[Category:Porsanger]] [[Category:Norwegian Army]]
